body_html:
I got the same problem when trying to install tensorflow:

sudo pip install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.7.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

Try this solution. It worked for me on ubuntu

body:
I got the same problem when trying to install tensorflow:

```
sudo pip install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.7.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
```

Try this [solution](http://stackoverflow.com/a/35277748/3481173). It worked for me on ubuntu
